sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: An equilateral triangle has a perimeter of 36 cm. What is the length of each side of the triangle?
message_2:
An equilateral triangle has three equal sides. To find the length of each side, divide the perimeter by the number of sides.

Length of each side = Perimeter / 3
Length of each side = 36 cm / 3
Length of each side = 12 cm

Each side of the equilateral triangle is 12 cm long.
